location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'SKETCH SURVEY OF SHATT AL ARAB RIVER BY Commander F.H. Walter R.N. and the Officers of H.M.S. ODIN April-1911.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 500 x 360mm, on sheet 575 x 400mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a stretch of the Shatt al Arab River in the vicinity of Fao, indicating hydrology, soundings, vegetation, settlements and prominent buildings, with brief notes on survey methodology and soundings.The map was made 'from a tracing by Lieut. C.C. Johnson, R.N.', and bears the printing statements, 'S[imla] D[rawing] O[ffice] Topo. Dy. No. 95. Exd. C.J.A., July 1911.', 'No. 5,415. 1911.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
